page.title: 06Letter To The Local MP
page.content: Our class is taking part in the BBC Domesday Project and we will be grateful if you could help us by answering some questions. We need to put on to the computer disc information about events that effect our area at this time. Could you please let us know how long have you been an MP for our area? Are there any events that have happened recently that have effected our area? Do you see any great changes, that will make a difference to Poole, coming in the near future? Can you think of anything you would like to say about this area that will be of interest in the future? We thank you for your help and look forward to your reply. (sgd) Mark Singleton & James Barry
